About the Warren Gazette

The Warren Gazette is the official news site of the Warren College Student Council (WCSC) at UC San Diego. Our mission is to keep the Warren College community informed about council activities, legislation, events, and important updates.

We are dedicated to transparency, engagement, and providing a reliable source of information for students, staff, and the broader UCSD community.

© 2025 Warren College Student Council
